name: Our Darker Purpose
blurb: Journey to the dark heart of the Edgewood Home for Lost Children in this fiendishly difficult action RPG!

rewards.reward: ADMISSION ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nGet a DIGITAL COPY of the game on release  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Edgewood Home for Lost Children DIGITAL WALLPAPER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ CREDIT in the game for making our dream come true. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   Also comes with exclusive Kickstarter-only item! (KS PACK #1)

EARLY ACCEPTANCE        ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\n**Special price -- act early** Includes ALL PRIOR REWARDS.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Also get CLOSED BETA ACCESS (FOR YOU AND A FRIEND!) \u2013 includes access to special forums.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Also comes with DIGITAL ART BOOK... See your favorite illustrations brought to electronic life in fine detail!  Flip ahead to examine some of the most dangerous monsters in the Edgewood Home (if you dare)!  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get exclusive Kickstarter-only upgrades! (KS PACK #2)
SOMEWHAT EARLY ACCEPTANCE ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **Special price -- act somewhat early -- same rewards as Early Acceptance tier**

TOUR OF THE GROUNDS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nGet ALL PRIOR REWARDS.  Also get CLOSED BETA ACCESS (FOR YOU AND A FRIEND!) \u2013 includes access to special forums. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Also comes with DIGITAL ART BOOK... See your favorite illustrations brought to electronic life in fine detail!  Flip ahead to examine some of the most dangerous monsters in the Edgewood Home (if you dare)! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Plus get exclusive Kickstarter-only upgrades! (KS PACK #2)

FAVORED STUDENT ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Get ALL PRIOR REWARDS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus a SPOOKY HANDWRITTEN THANK YOU CARD with an ART PRINT (8"x11"). For clarification, the print, card, and handwriting will all be spooky.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nPlus get even cooler KS-exclusive class upgrades (KS PACK #3).

EDGEWOOD ONLINE LEARNING PACK (standalone) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The all-electronic pack for the digitally inclined student! This pack is not combined with any other rewards, but includes ALL DIGITAL REWARDS (including, of course, a digital copy of the game on release). Also includes: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Edgewood Home for Lost Children high-resolution DIGITAL WALLPAPER! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ CREDIT in the game for making our dream come true! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The DIGITAL ART BOOK, filled with some of Edgewood\u2019s most dangerous monsters and bosses that you may not have even encountered yet! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ CLOSED BETA ACCESS (FOR YOU AND A FRIEND!) \u2013 includes access to special forums! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And.. ALL Kickstarter-exclusive in-game rewards! All the perks, all the upgrades! (KS PACK #5)

KNOWN PRODIGY ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Get ALL PRIOR REWARDS (except KS PACK #5) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Plus a TERRIFYING EDGEWOOD HOME FOR LOST CHILDREN POSTER! Hang it in your window to frighten off burglars! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Comes with 5 MORE BETA ACCESS KEYS to give your friends! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Plus get awesome digital rewards. (KS PACK #4)

DIGNIFIED ALUMNUS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Get ALL PRIOR REWARDS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus an exclusive "EDGEWOOD HOME FOR LOST CHILDREN" T-SHIRT!  You'll look clever as a Capulet in this smart number.  Please refer your impressed friends to our website. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Also comes with ALL KS-exclusive items. Every. Single. One. (KS PACK #5)

BOARD OF TRUSTEES ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Plus, friends at this tier get their NAME ON A LEVEL!   Will it appear every time you play?  Not really, but it\u2019s out there, and you never know when it might show up!  You\u2019ll even get some input on what kind of room you get \u2013 perhaps Cordy could wander into the (Your Last Name Here) Auditorium of Advancement\u2026  we\u2019ll work with you!

PLAQUE ON A WALL ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your NAME INCLUDED IN LORE as an unfortunate soul at Edgewood.  Your friends reading the stories of the building won't believe their eyes!

PROCTOR ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR REWARDS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your IMAGE in the game as a FERAL STUDENT!  Each time you play, you may get a chance to see Cordy battle YOU!  Be animated by our artists!

SCHOLAR ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your IMAGE in the game as a fearsome WOUNDWORT, the strongest of the strong!   \r\n(Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).

INSTRUCTOR ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your IMAGE in the game as a crafty CAPULET, the most terrifying students in the manor.  (Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).

PROFESSOR ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your image in the game as a POWERFUL MYSTERY CHARACTER.  You'll know who it is, but we won't tell anyone else! (Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).

DEAN ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your IMAGE in the game as an EARLY BOSS.  Also get input on what that boss might do!  Strike terror in the hearts of friends and strangers alike!  (Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).

HEADMASTER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your IMAGE in the game as a LATE-STAGE BOSS.  Wrap yourself in strength formidable!  And get input on what your boss does. (Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).

STATUE ON CAMPUS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus get your image in the game as EDGAR or EILEEN,  a new playable character! The playable character comes with a completely new attack.  
(Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Also includes an ONLINE HANG-OUT WITH THE DEVS, where we'll talk you through the game!

YOU OWN THE SCHOOL
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ GET ALL PRIOR (non-image) REWARDS. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Plus a NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTER BASED ON YOU!  You help design the back story!  The playable character comes with a completely new attack, and comes with our undying gratitude. (Note -- you can't get your image in the game multiple times, cause that would be weird).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Plus come SPEND THE DAY WITH US!  We can't cover your travel/lodging, but we'll take you out to lunch and dinner, talk you through our design process and ideas for the game, share the coolest hidden monsters and secrets, and generally entertain you as best we can (Edgewood-style)!
